text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump The US may have performed the most tests overall but that number is inconsequential compared to per capita testing. We are woefully behind many other nations in that regard and well behind where we need to be. Stop comparing 🍎s and 🍊s.
https://t.co/poMV5FMmHb
